name: Santosh
title: Full-Stack Developer, Web Developer,Software Developer

about: üîß I love building full-stack web applications, solving real-world problems, and learning new tech. I build beautiful, interactive web apps with 3D animations. Currently building Agri-Connect and several full-stack projects.

education.details: Pursuing Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science with focus on full-stack development and modern web technologies.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Building modern web applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Developed multiple full-stack projects including e-commerce platforms, social networks, and clinic management systems.
achievements: Built Agri-Connect platform connecting farmers and buyers
Developed social networking site with Java and MySQL
Created clinic management system with Next.js

projects.name: Agri-Connect
projects.desc: A web app connecting farmers, buyers, and experts. Features marketplace, social features, and agricultural resources. Built with React, Node.js, SQL, and TypeScript.

projects.name: Social Network Site
projects.desc: A full-stack social networking web application built using Java (JSP, Servlets) and MySQL. Features include user authentication, profile management, friend system, posts with images, likes, comments.

projects.name: Clinic Front Desk
projects.desc: A front-desk web app for clinics built with Next.js & Tailwind CSS. Manages appointments, patient info, and daily clinic workflows in a responsive UI.

projects.name: Smart Online Voting System
projects.desc: A Python-based Smart Online Voting System with modules for voter registration, authentication, secure voting, and admin management. Designed to explore digital voting and database integration.

projects.name: Drum Machine
projects.desc: A JavaScript-based Drum Machine web app that lets users play drum sounds by clicking buttons or pressing keys. Built as an interactive project to practice web audio and DOM manipulation.

projects.name: clinic-front-desk
projects.desc: A front-desk web app for clinics built with Next.js & Tailwind CSS. Manages appointments, patient info, and daily clinic workflows in a responsive UI

projects.name: AI-powered interview assistant
projects.desc: AI-powered interview assistant that turns a resume into a timed, 6-question interview and generates AI-based scoring and summaries for interviewers.

certificates.name: progaraming in java
certificates.issuer: National Programme on Technology Enhanced Learning(NPTEL)
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the 'Programming in Java' course offered by NPTEL and IIT Kanpur. The course covered fundamental and advanced concepts of Java, including object-oriented programming, classes and objects, inheritance, interfaces, exception handling, multithreading, collections, and file handling. It also introduced GUI programming using AWT and applets. Weekly assignments and quizzes helped reinforce theoretical knowledge with practical coding skills. This course enhanced my ability to develop Java applications and strengthened my overall programming foundation

certificates.name: Responsive Web Design
certificates.description: I successfully earned the Responsive Web Design Certification from freeCode amp.Through this course, I built multiple projects like a tribute page, survey form, and personal portfolio.I gained hands-on experience in HTML5 and CSS3, including Flexbox and CSS Grid.The certification emphasized creating websites that look great on all devices.It strengthened my foundation in front-end web development and responsive design principles.

certificates.name: Front End Development Libraries
certificates.description: I earned the Front End Development Libraries Certification from freeCodeCamp. This course deepened my skills in React, Redux, Bootstrap, jQuery, and Sass. I built interactive projects like a Markdown Previewer and a Drum Machine. It enhanced my understanding of component-based architecture and UI May 17, 2025 Currently ongoing design. This certification strengthened my ability to build dynamic, responsive web applications.

certificates.name: Scientific Computing with Python
certificates.description: I earned the Scientific Computing with Python Certification from freeCodeCamp.The course covered Python fundamentals, data structures, and libraries like math and datetime.I built real-world projects such as a budget calculator and time calculator.It strengthened my problem-solving skills using Python for scientific and technical tasks.This certification laid a strong foundation in programming and computational thinking with Python.
